mods.abstract: Kiosk of Trajan and First Pylon Temple of Isis at Philae (Ptolemaic-Roman Periods); Temple of Isis complex and Kiosk of Trajan among ruins on the island of Philae (foreground); ruins and plam trees (background); "880. Phylae: vue generale des temples J.P. Sebah" in white along bottom of print. (Number on object is 2/698).

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
